name: HashedIn Technologies
description:
HashedIn was founded in 2010 with a mission to help businesses translate ideas to market ready products at speed, by leveraging digital technologies in innovative ways. In the last 7+ years, we have built, transformed and launched 90+ products for 75+ customers globally.
We create unfair advantage for businesses by building software products in weeks, not years. The HashedIn Way - HiWayTM, allows us to combine expertise in leading technologies and a culture of innovation to deliver faster.
We don’t just build great software, we guarantee business outcomes.
We are the partner to accelerate the digital journey for an enterprise. Typical use cases for the customers are "Software Modernization" & "Product Innovation".
The following are the solutions that we offer to the customers as part of end to end Digital Transformation:-
Digital Strategy / Tech Consulting --> Plan for Growth
Customer Experience --> Consistent Experience
Intelligent Platforms --> Build Ecosystem
Smart Infrastructure & DevOps - Automation --> Deliver Faster
Data Engineering and Analytics --> Gain Insights
iOT Enabled Systems --> Experiment Responsibily
